attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2024-0902

Date: 2024-07-19

Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Transport, under section 105 of the Financial Administration Act, approves the appointment by the Minister of Transport of Jonathan Scott of Bradford West Gwillimbury, Ontario, to be a director of the board of directors of VIA Rail Canada Inc., to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.


Sur recommandation du ministre des Transports, en vertu de l’article 105 de la Loi sur la gestion des finances publiques, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil approuve la nomination par le ministre des Transports de Jonathan Scott, de Bradford West Gwillimbury (Ontario), administrateur du conseil d’administration de VIA Rail Canada Inc., à titre amovible pour un mandat de quatre ans.
attachmentText:
PC Number: 2024-0902Date: 2024-07-19



Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Transport, under section 105 of the Financial Administration Act, approves the appointment by the Minister of Transport of Jonathan Scott of Bradford West Gwillimbury, Ontario, to be a director of the board of directors of VIA Rail Canada Inc., to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.


Sur recommandation du ministre des Transports, en vertu de l’article 105 de la Loi sur la gestion des finances publiques, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil approuve la nomination par le ministre des Transports de Jonathan Scott, de Bradford West Gwillimbury (Ontario), administrateur du conseil d’administration de VIA Rail Canada Inc., à titre amovible pour un mandat de quatre ans.
